Description: RARE+++ MEN'S CLASSIC STYLE Ω OMEGA WORLD TIME GENTS OVERSIZED WRISTWATCH, SWISS MADE *SERVICED* ***No reserved price!!!*** Dear customers, we present for sale this pre-owned gorgeous mega rare vintage Swiss Omega World Time wristwatch. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! If you have been collecting watches for a while, I think you’re going to appreciate the following sophisticated antique timepiece that is hard to find nowadays. This watch is prized for reliability, convenience in use, and meets relatively seldom. A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the original high grade, gold-filled pocket watch movement '' OMEGA '' with 15 Ruby Jewels. In an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. The branded original movement on the back side is stamped a serial number #7841584. Signed : '' OMEGA 15 JEWELS SWISS #7841584 '' . Smooth and strong running of the balance. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time! In the movement have additional mechanism to shows the time like that ( in two zones )!!! With other words the movement is original, with some modifications!!! See the photos for more details!!! Note : Mechanism of the watch is made so that the arrows ( the main hands from the small hand on the sub dial around 1 and 3 o'clock position ) always move with 4:00 hours difference! We can adjust the hands of a desired time!!! This astonishing timepiece has a four-piece, double hinged case that testifies about a quality of watch. This watch was converted from pocket watch! The inner dust cover lid was used to protect the mechanism from dust and debris and to provide an extra layer of protection from shock or moisture. The case is made of chrome/nickel. Professionally polished, it's literally like a mirror. With soft signs of time or wear. The inside of back lid has the trademark Omega Watch Co. triangle with the inscription ‘ OMEGA - SWISS MADE - FABRICATION SUISSE '' about it and case reference number #8688904. The watch supplied with a brand new genuine leather strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. For more photos to the case see photos below the whole description!!! Diameter watch without the crown: 46 mm.Diameter watch with the crown: 49,5 mmThickness watch: 13 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! This amazing timepiece has new impeccably renovated original white, enameled dial, was made in 2017. In excellent cosmetic condition, no signs of any scratches, cracks or hairlines. The dial has black Arabic numerals, two sub dials, also is signed : '' Ω OMEGA ''. One sub dial shows seconds, second sub dial shows time in GMT. The main dial shows time in the country. The plastic dome crystal is changed with brand new, because old one was in very worse condition! See the photos for more details!!! The watches under the trade mark 'OMEGA’ always differed by style, accuracy and fidelity to the best traditions of watch affair. So this OMEGA watch is most definitely one of the more interesting watches that you can buy! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED!
